author: Source: Connecticut Post
title: Greenwich businesses adapting to Chip and Pin - Connecticut Post
text:
Little Eric of Greenwich shoe store employee Javier Priego with the new credit card reader, left, and the older models, center and right, in the store located at 15 East Elm Street in Greenwich, Conn., Wednesday, Oct. 7, 2015. Little Eric of Greenwich shoe store employee Javier Priego demonstrates the new credit card reader in the store located at 15 East Elm Street in Greenwich.
 Connecticut Post.
